text:
Using the following command for the manager:

http://localhost:8080/manager/install?path=/&war=jar:file:d:/jakarta-tomcat-
4.0.1/webapps/alh-tng.war!/

The program gets an 'IllegalStateException'. The logfile reads:

2002-01-17 08:53:21 Manager: remove: Removing web application at '/'
2002-01-17 08:53:21 StandardHost[localhost]: Removing web application at 
context path 
2002-01-17 08:53:30 Manager: install: Installing web application at '/' 
from 'jar:file:d:/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1/webapps/alh-tng.war!/'
2002-01-17 08:53:30 StandardHost[localhost]: Installing web application at 
context path  from URL jar:file:d:/jakarta-tomcat-4.0.1/webapps/alh-tng.war!/
2002-01-17 08:53:30 ManagerServlet.install[/]
java.lang.IllegalStateException: zip file closed
